info.description:
=========================================
POS Remove restriction on change quantity
=========================================

Module extending l10n_fr_pos_cert for disabling the function that prevent decreasing line quantities / removing lines

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

Usage
=====

To use this module, you need to:

#. Open a point of sale session
#. Select products and set a quantity
#. Decrease quantity for some products (no more negative amount line is created)

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/l10n-france/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed
